title: Stack first time at 14% on downloading client and then on 1%
body: Hey guys Iâ€™m just wondering, I installed lol on my computer but the client stuck first time at 14% and then at 1% what do I have to do? My kbps fall to hell without reason. Please help thanks in advance.

replies.body: This early on, there could actually be a security setting blocking game files from being read.  Start off with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your game files are allowed to be read and get updated.  Let me know if you have any questions!
